sources.title: First Merchants freed from 2019 Justice Department order
sources.snippet: First Merchants in Muncie, Ind., has been freed from a 2019 order from the Department of Justice tied to its fair lending practices. The $17.7 billion-asset company disclosed in a regulatory filing that the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Indiana approved a joint request from its bank and the DoJ to terminated the order.
